snippet.title: [Gamescom 2018] Redeemer: Enhanced Edition — Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
More about the game — http://redeemerthegame.com/

Rampant chaos, superhuman reflexes, and unrestrained violence fuel this savage beat-'em-up for players tired of mindless clicking and grinding. Armed with a full combat system including disarms, parries, and combos, Redeemer leaves little room for luck and weakness. Sharpen your skills and fight alone or with a friend to destroy your enemies. Fall 2018 on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.
